channel.title: How do i edit items?
channel.description:
i found a hacked ring on my server that gives 5000 to everything... -.- im on a 317 server and i was wondering if i can give a sword extra attributes.... anyone know?
thanks -joey

item.title: How do i edit items?
item.dc:creator: @pinhead936 pinhead936
item.description:
@pinhead936 wrote:

Or it’s ruby ring, normally item id : 773

Read full topic

item.title: How do i edit items?
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Just search “dragonstone or dragon_stone” or just simply “dragon” until you reach this.
Scroll over until you see “5000” of all the stats and lower to “0”

Read full topic

item.title: How do i edit items?
item.dc:creator: @Pasta325 Pasta325
item.description:
@Pasta325 wrote:

[quote=“kickyamom50, post:2, topic:354897”]lol, it’s not hacked…lemme guess, “perfect” ring? lol just go into items.cfg and search it, first three numbers are low alch, store price, and high alch, then the following numbers are it’s stats. if you want to edit a sword, search for it and edit it’s stats, or to make one of your own, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363483.0.html.
Hope i helped :)[/quote]

accualy i tryed that the perfect ring isnt hacked lol its a dragonstone ring!

but i will try that asap tyvm

Read full topic

@kickyamom50 wrote:

lol, it’s not hacked…lemme guess, “perfect” ring? lol just go into items.cfg and search it, first three numbers are low alch, store price, and high alch, then the following numbers are it’s stats. if you want to edit a sword, search for it and edit it’s stats, or to make one of your own, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363483.0.html.
Hope i helped
